question: [Explain] Svenska: Ange the slope of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.

qas.question: [Explain] Svenska: Ange the slope of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.
[Note] Turkce: Cizilen dogru icin the intercept of the noisy line belirt.
[Challenge] Norsk: Oppgi the value of y when x equals 1 for linjen som vises.
